channel.title: Nyanx 508 [Going live soon!]
channel.description:
Hello moparscape, today I will be working on something odd most of you remember TokkulScape aka Mezzy-Scape anyways I was inspired by this source as it was the first one I ever used. Like most people :p Anyways today I will continue to develop it improve combat, stability etc. I will host this under Alpha stage meaning resets would be common. My plan for this is creating the last 508 online. I will not focus on HD as it's useless and looks pretty bad in the 508 era + I have no idea how the HD packets work Yet. Developers: Mezzyscape562 (Flavius - Me) [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/761/bd604527059f40ddbff57fb.png[/img] [img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/8366/b9e9a12944604152a2fe603.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/HPBUYRK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/43loYvR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Zsdtq8U.png[/img] [img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/5488/f2f1e1ff984b4ba7887547e.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/8177/6a76cae9b01344989d2c04e.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BPxm3xt.png[/img] [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/6225/5905b4969bf2435e9c68602.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/2388/f9b0d16aee074926a308496.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tU3HIyS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LcaBMlR.png[/img] [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/4977/480712a1eaac445098bf040.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wmhj6j0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rhvzTYN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BD7pmTx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8DqRX4F.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/38otMI3.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/myL8FgN.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IYLqGoR.png[/img] What I got done so far / Chaneglog
5/3/2013 Added Summoning (Timer, Spawning, Following, Calling, Dismiss, All Npcs) Deleted Old Firemaking and started my own Deleted the super crappy fletching started new one 5/1/2013 Added Woodcutting 4/30/2013 Added Mining 4/27/2013 Fixed sidebar trade bug. Finished make over mage with save on log out Finished Reworking Combat Added Working Make-Over Mage 4/26/2013 Changed Shizzle - Welcome Message Started a Basic Website and Highscores 4/24/2013 Added a Basic Music system. Removed useless npcs. I finished clearing up junk code and errors Started project

item.title: Nyanx 508 [Going live soon!]
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:34, topic:517877”]update[/quote]
I don’t know what you mean but if you’re referring to the lack of updates I posted is because Sunday, Monday and Tuesday are my busiest days, I will add loads of content and bug fixes today.

[quote=“Tutorial, post:32, topic:517877”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=636141.msg4288901#msg4288901 date=1366865480]
I have to admit, these sources make me want to learn Java and make a stable 508 because it interests me, I could care less about programming 317. Good luck with the development, and I wish for the best!
[/quote]
I can see how it would be pointless to use a 317 based protocol when you have 508 graphics and content in mind, but I suppose people do it because the 508 protocol isn’t used as much.[/quote]
Tutorial the reason why people aren’t using 508s is because they have nothing to leech there are not many 508s out there + everyone is into new shit and theres another reason everyone is using PI because there are a shit load of tutorials for PI while there are not so many for 508s If 508s were to come back Tutorials would start showing up again, What I am trying to do is create a 508 Host it and Release it. Of course I will release it after I finish the project. The reason why I will be hosting this is to motivate other people to start their own 508.

Read full topic
